description: Reload selected extension with the Gnome Shell Extension Reloader in Wayland and Xorg without restarting the shell with [Alt F2 r]. Limitations: This extension will reload an extension from the extension disk files only when the extension is in the error state; othewise, the Gnome Shell session must be restarted.  See Extension Homepage for additional information.
name: Gnome Shell Extension Reloader
